Reviews.Content: stayed hotel indigo 10 weeks 2008 am currently staying 12 weeks continue indigo exceptional customer service hotel staff hotel friendly walk front door am called name feel am staying family front desk dora trina gerardo nina bar ben devon curbside michael larry franklin reuben greg treated truly appreciate business job pride past continue recommend hotel friends family colleagues jason

Reviews.Title: “First Class”
Reviews.Author: kakLittleRock_Ar
Reviews.Content: loved stay hotel indigo bellman met street cheerfully bags inside guests checking time arrived staff immediately greeted started checkin desk manager lobby greeted told elevator ok concerned noise id shot absolutely clean linens comfy bed nice bathroom couldnt delicious breakfasts delivered reasonable price sad leave

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Indigo Dallas Downtown
HotelInfo.Address: 1933 Main St., Dallas, TX 75201
